sentence.Network_en: We rehearsed frenziedly the last few days before the premiere.
sentence.Network_cn: 初次公演前的那几天我们疯狂地排练.

sentence.Network_en: Then they pressed on more frenziedly with their policy of expansion.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时他们更加疯狂地推行扩张政策.

sentence.Network_en: Do not know that the wedding actually will be so - called celebrating wedding in bridal chamber frenziedly!
sentence.Network_cn: 想不到婚礼竟然会如此的疯狂闹洞房!

sentences.sentence: "we rehearsed frenziedly the last few days before the premiere"
